SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO ASC) AS "RNUM", BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, MEMBER_NICKNAME
FROM "BOARD" B
JOIN "BOARD_TYPE" BT ON (B.BOARD_CODE = BT.BOARD_CODE) JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO)
WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.BOARD_CODE = 3 ORDER BY RNUM DESC
